from.query:
WITH
browser_clean AS (
  SELECT
    Advertiser,
    Advertiser_Id,
    Campaign,
    Campaign_Id,
    Browser_Platform,
   Activity,
    Activity_ID,
    CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Chrome).*") THEN "Chrome" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Firefox).*") THEN "Firefox" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Safari).*") THEN "Safari"
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPad).*") THEN "Safari" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPad).*") THEN "Safari" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPhone).*") THEN "Safari" 
    ELSE "Other"
    END AS Clean_Browser,
    Platform_Type,
    Report_Day,
    View_Through_Conversions,
    Click_Through_Conversions,
    Total_Conversions
  FROM [PARAMETER].CM_Browser_Floodlight
)

  SELECT
    *,
    CASE WHEN Platform_Type="Mobile highend: smartphone" OR Platform_Type="Mobile midrange: feature phone" OR Platform_Type="Tablet" THEN Total_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Mobile_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Platform_Type="Desktop" THEN Total_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Desktop_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Total_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Total_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Total_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Convs
  FROM browser_clean

WITH
browser_clean AS (
  SELECT
    Advertiser,
    Advertiser_Id,
    Campaign,
    Campaign_Id,
    Site_Dcm,
    Browser_Platform,
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Chrome).*") THEN "Chrome" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Firefox).*") THEN "Firefox" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*Safari).*") THEN "Safari"
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPad).*") THEN "Safari" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPad).*") THEN "Safari" 
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser_Platform, "((?i).*iPhone).*") THEN "Safari" 
    ELSE "Other"
    END AS Clean_Browser,
    Platform_Type,
    Report_Day,
    Impressions,
    Clicks,
    View_Through_Conversions,
    Click_Through_Conversions
  FROM [PARAMETER].CM_Browser_Delivery
)

 SELECT
    *,
   CASE WHEN Platform_Type="Mobile highend: smartphone" OR Platform_Type="Mobile midrange: feature phone" OR Platform_Type="Tablet" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Mobile_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Platform_Type="Desktop" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Desktop_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Platform_Type="Connected TV" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS CTV_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Imps
  FROM browser_clean

WITH
browser_cleaned AS (
  SELECT 
    Advertiser,
    Advertiser_Id,
    Advertiser_Currency,
    Browser,
    Campaign,
    Campaign_Id,
    Insertion_Order, 
    Insertion_Order_Id,
    Report_Day,
    Device_Type,
    Environment,
    Impressions,
    Clicks,
    Post_Click_Conversions,
    Post_View_Conversions,
    Revenue_Adv_Currency as Revenue,
    Media_Cost_Advertiser_Currency,
    CASE
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser, "((?i).*Chrome).*") THEN "Chrome" 
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser, "((?i).*Firefox).*") THEN "Firefox" 
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser, "((?i).*Safari).*") THEN "Safari"
      ELSE "Other"
      END AS Clean_Browser,
    CASE 
      WHEN Browser="Safari 12" THEN "Safari 12"
      WHEN Browser="Safari 11" THEN "Safari 11"
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(Browser, "((?i).*Safari).*") AND Browser!="Safari 12" AND Browser!="Safari 11" THEN "Safari 10 & Below"
      ELSE "Non Safari"
    END AS ITP_Affected_Browsers
   FROM [PARAMETER].DV360_Browser_Delivery 
)

  SELECT
    *,
    CASE WHEN Device_Type="Smart Phone" OR Device_Type="Tablet" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Mobile_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Device_Type="Desktop" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Desktop_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Device_Type="Connected TV" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS CTV_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Imps,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Imps,
    CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Revenue ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Rev,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Revenue ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Rev,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Revenue ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Rev,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Chrome" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Chrome_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Safari" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Safari_Convs,
   CASE WHEN Clean_Browser="Firefox" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS Firefox_Convs,
   
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 12" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS S12_Imps,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 11" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS S11_Imps,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 10 & Below" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS S_Imps,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Non Safari" THEN Impressions ELSE 0 END AS NS_Imps,
   
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 12" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S12_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 11" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S11_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 10 & Below" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S_Click_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Non Safari" THEN Post_Click_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS NS_Click_Convs,
   
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 12" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S12_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 11" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S11_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 10 & Below" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S_View_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Non Safari" THEN Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS NS_View_Convs,
   
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 12" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S12_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 11" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S11_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Safari 10 & Below" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS S_Convs,
   CASE WHEN ITP_Affected_Browsers="Non Safari" THEN Post_Click_Conversions+Post_View_Conversions ELSE 0 END AS NS_Convs
   
   
  FROM browser_cleaned

WITH cm AS ( SELECT Report_Day, CASE  WHEN Platform_Type="Desktop" THEN "Desktop" WHEN Platform_Type="Tablet" THEN "Mobile_Tablet" WHEN Platform_Type="Mobile highend: smartphone" THEN "Mobile_Tablet" WHEN Platform_Type="Mobile midrange: feature phone" THEN "Mobile_Tablet" WHEN Platform_Type="Connected TV" THEN "CTV" END AS Device_Clean, SUM(Impressions) as CM_Impressions FROM `[PARAMETER].CM_Browser_Delivery`  GROUP BY 1,2 ),  dv3 AS ( SELECT Report_Day as RD, CASE  WHEN Device_Type="Desktop" THEN "Desktop" WHEN Device_Type="Tablet" THEN "Mobile_Tablet" WHEN Device_Type="Smart Phone" THEN "Mobile_Tablet" WHEN Device_Type="Connected TV" THEN "CTV" END AS Device_Clean_DV360, SUM(Impressions) as DV360_Impressions FROM `[PARAMETER].DV360_Browser_Delivery`  GROUP BY 1,2 )  SELECT Report_Day, Device_Clean, CM_Impressions, DV360_Impressions FROM cm a JOIN dv3 b ON a.Report_Day=b.RD AND a.Device_Clean=b.Device_Clean_DV360
